name: Dungeon Race
description:
Dungeon Race Game for Brackeys Game Jam 2021_1.

Two Player local Platformer. Simple Shape Graphic, cause i suck at Art.

Lava, enemies, difficult jumping passages and a boss await you.  But you have weapons. Can you manage this challenge alone and be faster than your opponent?

Includes an Online Leaderboard!

(For now only worked for the Desktop Build)

- Finish the Dungeon faster than your Opponent - designed for Two players - You can Jump, Doublejump, and Attack - Lights are Checkpoints - Use Portals to swap arround  - Blue can Destroy Rectancles - Red can Destroy Triangles - Defeat the Boss Controls: Blue PlayerRed PlayerA - LeftNumpad 4 - LeftD - RightNumpad 6- RightW - Jump/DoublejumpNumpad 8 - Jump/DoublejumpSpace - AttackNumpad 0 - AttackP - Reset Game

Developed from Scratch by Gugof

https://twitter.com/gugofz

Boss Music Theme by

Eric Matyas

www.soundimage.org
